entry.title: BIP proposal for Lightning-oriented multiaccount multisig HD wallets
entry.summary: Simone Bronzini, a developer, has proposed a new structure to improve multi-account management in different multisig accounts under the same master key. The proposal addresses the issue of avoiding key reuse while allowing cosigners to generate new addresses independently. The proposal aims to facilitate the management of multiple cryptocurrencies or forks of Bitcoin, where users can use the same master key. Simone Bronzini has requested feedback on two issues, which include the coin_type level and SegWit addresses. The proposal is still a work in progress and will be submitted as a BIP draft after receiving feedback.
